languages.name: JavaScript
languages.use_case: The primary language for web development (front-end and back-end with Node.js), mobile apps, and desktop apps.

languages.name: Python
languages.use_case: Web development (Django, Flask), data science, machine learning, scripting, and automation. Known for its readability.

languages.name: Rust
languages.use_case: Systems programming, game engines, and performance-critical applications where safety and concurrency are key.

languages.name: Go
languages.use_case: Backend services, networking tools, and cloud-based applications. Designed for simplicity and efficiency in concurrent systems.
